post.body: Nice, well I followed you, hope to talk to you again soon, I am off to bed for the night!
haha 50, I always get this confused!
what part of CA are you from?
haha, that is because you are from there, trust me the midwest sucks! I hate snow, and cold weather!
haha, no your fine! it is good to learn more about things!
John, Paul, Ringo, George, there all 4
nice, I want to move out to CA someday, just need to find a job and the money to get me out there! I am sick of the midwest!
hey do not forget to sign up for the forums! http://toddrecommends.tv/forum we just added them!
Los Angeles
yes I know, thanks for the info! He should have been more specific! no worries
Yoko Ono
Himself
or should say franchise was Des Plaines
it was founded in California, but the first location was in Des Plaines, IL
Sherlock Holmes!
that last 2 were by google, but I knew the Michaelangelo one
michelangelo
Ian Fleming
I need to start playing that game again, I have not finished it yet!
thanks, I sure hope it does to!
ah I see, I'll try to stream tomorrow night
he said he is going to talk it over with the hiring manager, it sounded good, so I need to give them a call in a few days
I streamed last night, and nobody showed up, I have been busy watching LOST, I am sure I'll stream soon!
thanks!
thanks for the follow! I am following you back as well!
I agree, it does not need to be remade! Nobody can fill the shoes of Brandon Lee in my opinion, I mean he died doing it!
I hear you, why remake a movie that does not need to be remade, just has no logic in my book. That is Hollywood for you!
I do not think they need to remake The Crow, basically after every movie released after the first seemed like a remake and sucked!
sounds good!
I see, I have been debating on picking it up or not. Maybe I will give in and buy it!
Yeah I am really loving the show!
sounds good, I'll let you know next time I am on
yeah that was a video from college!
yes I am Toddrecommends!! haha, how was your X-mas?
Here is that video of me dancing like Michael Jackson http://tinyurl.com/8a9dz6
your smile is great! When will I get my plane ticket? haha
I am doing pretty good, how was your X-mas?
yes it was crazy fog all through illinois and Indiana, up until a bit in Ohio and then just cleared up!
Merry Christmas!!!!
Merry Christmas!!!!!
Merry ChristmasÂ¡!!!
Merry Christmas!!!!
Merry Christmas!!!!!
no I have not heard of Dave Moyer, wh is that?
Alright off to bed, thanks again everyone for the b-day wishes!
Finished Lost Season 4 only took me one day to finish! It was quite good, loved the ending, cannot wait a few weeks for season 5 to start!
actually have things to do today, waiting for 4 o' clock for a phone interview...wish me luck
finally starting season 4 of LOST, cannot wait to see the end, I have been waiting for months!
The Crow is getting remade! http://movies.ign.com/articles/938/938301p1.html All I say is it better be good. Brandon Lee is The Crow!
streaming live http://toddrecommends.tv/live
downloading 10.5.6 for OS X, go get yours if you have not!
Finally back in Ohio, we drove 6 and half hours in straight fog!
On the road back to Ohio
Out shopping with my Dad for the day!
Up and about, going to join in the madness of shopping today!
Headed out to Christmas dinner with the family!
Merry christmas everyone, hope everyone has a great day!
Just got done with opening presents and Christmas with my Grandma and Aunt made 180 bucks!
Opening gifts with the family
